graphics

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents a color with 4 floating-point channels

      Creates a color with the given RGBA values
